name: @dxworks/cli-parent
description: Parent package of the cli project
author: Mario Rivis

scripts.lint: lerna run lint && sort-package-json package.json packages/*/package.json --check
scripts.lint:fix: lerna run lint:fix && sort-package-json package.json packages/*/package.json
scripts.run:dev:validate-fix: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node dist/app/index.js dev validate --fix test.manifest.yml
scripts.start:dev:validate: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/app/index.ts dev validate test.manifest.yml
scripts.start:dev:validate-fix: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/app/index.ts dev validate --fix test.manifest.yml
scripts.start:voyenv:install: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/app/index.ts voyenv install
scripts.start:voyenv:instrument: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/app/index.ts voyenv instrument
